thread.title: BRIEF-Roaring Blue Lion Capital Says Will Not Solicit For Homestreet Nominees Or Shareholder Proposals

title: BRIEF-Roaring Blue Lion Capital Says Will Not Solicit For Homestreet Nominees Or Shareholder Proposals

organizations.name: brief-roaring blue lion capital says will not solicit for homestreet
brief-roaring blue lion capital says will not solic
homestreet nominees or shareholder proposals reuters

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Roaring Blue Lion Capital Management:
* ROARING BLUE LION CAPITAL MANAGEMENT - ON APRIL 11, SENT LETTER TO HOMESTREET STATING WOULD NOT SOLICIT FOR THEIR NOMINEES OR SHAREHOLDER PROPOSALS
* ROARING BLUE LION CAPITAL MANAGEMENT SAYS WOULD SOLICIT VOTES AGAINST ELECTION OF DIRECTOR CANDIDATES NOMINATED BY HOMESTREET INC Source text: ( bit.ly/2EF77pM ) Further company coverage:
